app_name: All In One Food App - Swiggy, Zomato, Uber Eats
app_detail:
Top Brands include - swiggy, uber eats, zomato, kfc, domino, doordash, grubhub, mcdonald, eat24, frsh, dabbagul, foodcloud, behrouz, starbucks, gru bhub, subway, deliveroo, burger king, and many more...

FoodBox ( Food Box ) - Search and buy from top food apps from India, US, France, Germany, Singapore, Malaysia, Canada, UK and many more. Get you food delivered from all online food ordering app. Find the best restaurant near you, compare prices, get the best deals on online food order from more than 20 online food order app.

FoodBox ( Food Box ) is a Must-Have App that helps you:
âœ”ï¸ Order from multiple food apps
âœ”ï¸ Save Phone Memory by bringing all food apps in One App
âœ”ï¸ Price Comparison - Compare prices by going to other tabs
âœ”ï¸ Add new stores easily like swiggy, zomato, Starbucks, KFC, McDonalds, etc
âœ”ï¸ View Best Offers, Coupons & Deals from Top Stores like KFC, Dominos, etc. and search for food items like - biryani, burger, pizza, tacos, etc. to compare prices
âœ”ï¸ Save & Track All Your Orders In One Place
âœ”ï¸ Most Relevant Results Customized According to Your Need

Use FoodBox(India) online food delivery app to:

- Order food from Zomato and get your food delivered at home.
- Order food online from FoodPanda with great discounts
- Get your food delivered by online food ordering app swiggy with their 30mins guaranteed delivery.
- Food ordering from Uber Eats with minimum delivery charges.
- Book online food from Box8 (Irresistible Desi meals)
- Order delicious food online and get delivered at home from Faasos - Eat good, Eat exciting.
- Order delicious Pizza online from your favorite Food ordering app Domino's, Pizza Hut & Mojo Pizza and get huge cashbacks
- Order fresh Food online from FreshMenu (Fresh Menu) and get your food delivered at home - Eat Fresh daily.
- Order Biryani Online from best food app Behrouz Biryani - Taste the perfect Biryani freshly prepared with premium ingredients.


No more hassle of opening different websites, just add the websites you like to buy from and get their results on a single tap.


DISCLAIMER: The Icons used are owned by respective companies and FoodBox declares that it does not impersonate any brand. Icons have been used to show users the presence of such content inside the app.
